contribution_text: It will help us make your life more vibrant and make you Go more Happy, as contributions from GoHappy Club members is the only source of revenue to fund experts, interns & infrastructure.
how_much_contribute_text: Financial support of any size help fund our mission.
shagun: Yeh Shagun GoHappy Family ke Naam
refer_text: Members who will introduce atleast seven people (50+ of age) to join our GoHappy Club will get exciting gifts delivered at their homes!!
refer_msg: Share with your friends via WhatsApp/Facebook personally and ingroups by clicking on the 'Refer Now' button below.
referral_status: Click Here to See Your Referral Status
about_us_text: GoHappy Club is an initiative with a vision to make the happiest community of senior citizens.
about_mission: Our mission is to make senior citizens productive and engaged intheir second innings of lives. We empower them through Live Sessions in three different categories:
learning_text: Mobile Learning, Singing, Health, Art & Craft.
fitness_text: Diet, Yoga, Dance, Mental Health and many more to help them find joy and happiness in this modern & technological era.
step_1: 1. Share the referral link with your friends who are above 50 years of age.
step_2: 2. Ask them to click on the link, install the GoHappy Club app and register themselves in the app.
step_3: 3. Once registered, ask them to book and attend any session they want.
step_4: 4. Receive Thank You Gift from GoHappy Club delivered to your home once you have seven successful referrals.
rate_session: We'd love your feedback to improve future sessions. Please rate your experience.
rating_placeholder: Please Let us know how we can do better.
already_booked: You have already booked the same session for this date. Please cancel your booking of the other session and try again.
sure_cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel your booking?
after_30: You cannot join the session as you are joining after more than 30 minutes. Don't worry, you can still see the recording.
still_pending: We couldn't verify your Payment, it still in Pending.
sure_cancel_payment: Are you sure you want to cancel your payment.
